```{r Load Libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

---

```{r Select and Filter, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
starwars %>% 
  select(name, kind = species) %>% # you can rename a selected column within the pipe flow
  filter(kind %in% c("Human", "Droid"))
```

---

Fill (Down)
```{r Fill, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

df <- read_csv("data/fill_demo.csv")

df1 <- df %>% 
  # fill(column_name) to fill a specific column
  fill(1:5)
```
